name: Michael E. Shin
content: Michael (Eonsuk) Shin, Ph.D. | Faculty | Department of Computer Science | TTU Texas Tech University TTU Whitacre College of Engineering Department of Computer Science Faculty Michael (Eonsuk) Shin, Ph.D. Associate Professor and Strategic Planning Coordinator CS Email: michael.shin@ttu.edu Phone: 806.834.7350 Fax: 806.742.3519 Office: EC 311 Mailing Address:Texas Tech UniversityDepartment of Computer ScienceBox 43104Lubbock, TX 79409−3104 Personal Website:Dr. Michael Shin Research Interests Software engineering Self−managed software systems Secure software engineering Software product lines Personal Information Curriculum Vitae Education Ph.D., Information Technology in Software Engineering, George Mason University, (2002) M.Sc., Management Science, Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology, (1998) B.Sc., Industrial Engineering, Korea University, (1985) Department of Computer Science Like Department of Computer Science on FacebookLike Department of Computer Science on Facebook Follow Department of Computer Science on InstagramFollow Department of Computer Science on Instagram Connect with Department of Computer Science on LinkedInConnect with Department of Computer Science on LinkedIn Address Texas Tech University, Box 43104 | Lubbock, TX 79409-3104 Phone 806.742.3527 Email cs@ttu.edu © 2025 Texas Tech University Apr 16, 2025 3:01 PM
